context: I love The Lost Boys (1987) , can you recommend me some vampire movies?
I heard The Vampire Diaries (2009) was good. Also, the classic Interview with the Vampire (1994) was a good one. And anther fan favorite Twilight (2008)
Oh cool, I haven't seen either of those Haha, I actually never saw Twilight (2008)
Oh and let me not forget Bram Stoker's Dracula (1992)
Maybe I should see if it's at Redbox Oh yes, that's a classic. Loved it! Thank you!
resp: I actually haven't seen it either but I'm not much a vampire movie person but I have seen a few just not Twilight (2008) lol and know of people who do love those movies. lol
